theme.title: Two 16th notes, one quarter note and one 8th note
theme.para: In this lesson a new rhythmic pattern is introduced. This pattern can be written in two different ways:

score.music: (score (vers 1.6) (instrument (musicData (time 2 4 noVisible) (n * s g+)(n * s)(n * e l g-)(n * e g+)(n * e g-)(barline) (n * s g+)(n * s g-)(n * q)(n * e)(barline end) )))

part.title: Listen and take notice of the differences
part.para: Note the difference between the first measure and the others and how they are formed when putting a tie.

score.music: (score (vers 1.6) (instrument (musicData (clef G)(key C)(time 2 4)(n a4 s g+)(n a4 s)(n a4 e g-)(n a4 e g+)(n a4 e g-)(barline) (n a4 s g+)(n a4 s)(n a4 e l g-)(n a4 e g+)(n a4 e g-)(barline) (n a4 s g+)(n a4 s g-)(n a4 q)(n a4 e)(barline end) )))

part.title: Exercises
part.para: Exercise 1 - Train your ear and practise the introduced rhythmic patterns.
Exercise 2 - Read scores containing the rhythms studied in this lesson.
